member.summary: It returns the attribute data type.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgAttribute.AttributeEnumValues
member.summary: For datatypeEnum attributes it returns the array of acceptable values (string array).

member.name: T:SVGLib.SvgElement
member.summary: This is the base class of any Svg element.

member.name: M:SVGLib.SvgElement.getParent
member.summary: It returns the parent element.

member.name: M:SVGLib.SvgElement.setParent(SVGLib.SvgElement)
member.summary: It sets the parent element.

member.name: M:SVGLib.SvgElement.getChild
member.summary: It gest the first child element.

member.name: M:SVGLib.SvgElement.setChild(SVGLib.SvgElement)
member.summary: It sets the first child element.

member.name: M:SVGLib.SvgElement.getNext
member.summary: It gets the next sibling element.

member.name: M:SVGLib.SvgElement.setNext(SVGLib.SvgElement)
member.summary: It sets the next sibling element.

member.name: M:SVGLib.SvgElement.getPrevious
member.summary: It gets the previous sibling element.

member.name: M:SVGLib.SvgElement.setPrevious(SVGLib.SvgElement)
member.summary: It sets the previous element.

member.name: M:SVGLib.SvgElement.getInternalId
member.summary: It gets the internal Id of the element.
member.remarks: The internal Id is a unique number inside the SVG document. It is assigned when the element is added to the document.

member.name: M:SVGLib.SvgElement.setInternalId(System.Int32)
member.summary: It sets the internal Id of the element.

member.name: M:SVGLib.SvgElement.getElementName
member.summary: It returns the SVG element name.

member.name: M:SVGLib.SvgElement.getElementValue
member.summary: It returns the current element value.
member.remarks: Not all SVG elements are supposed to have a value. For instance a rect element or a circle do not usually have a value while a desc or a text they normally have it.

member.name: M:SVGLib.SvgElement.setElementValue(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the element value.

member.name: M:SVGLib.SvgElement.HasValue
member.summary: Flag indicating if a value is expected for the SVG element.
member.returns: true if the SVG element has normally a value.

member.name: M:SVGLib.SvgElement.getElementType
member.summary: It returns the SVG element type.

member.name: M:SVGLib.SvgElement.GetXML
member.summary: It returns the XML string of the SVG tree starting from the element.
member.remarks: The method is recursive so it creates the SVG string for the current element and for its sub-tree. If the element is the root of the SVG document the method return the entire SVG XML string.

member.name: M:SVGLib.SvgElement.GetTagXml
member.summary: It returns the XML string of the SVG element.

member.name: M:SVGLib.SvgElement.FillAttributeList(System.Collections.ArrayList,System.Collections.ArrayList,System.Collections.ArrayList)
member.summary: It gets all element attributes.

member.name: M:SVGLib.SvgElement.CloneAttributeList(SVGLib.SvgElement)
member.summary: It copies all the attributes of the element eleToClone to the current element.
member.param: Element that has to be cloned.

member.name: M:SVGLib.SvgElement.ElementInfo
member.summary: It returns a string containing current element info for logging purposes.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgElement.Id
member.summary: Standard XML attribute for assigning a unique name to an element.

member.name: T:SVGLib.SvgElement._SvgElementType
member.summary: List all SVG element types. For each element a specific class is defined in the library.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgBasicShape.XmlBase
member.summary: Specifies a base URI other than the base URI of the document or external entity.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgBasicShape.XmlLang
member.summary: Standard XML attribute to specify the language (e.g., English) used in the contents and attribute values of particular elements.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgBasicShape.XmlSpace
member.summary: Standard XML attribute to specify whether white space is preserved in character data. The only possible values are default and preserve.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgBasicShape.Class
member.summary: This attribute assigns a (CSS) class name or set of class names to an element.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgBasicShape.Style
member.summary: This attribute specifies style information for the current element. The style attribute specifies style information for a single element.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgBasicShape.Color
member.summary: It is the explicit color to be used to paint the current object.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgBasicShape.Opacity
member.summary: The uniform opacity setting to be applied across an entire object. Any values outside the range 0.0 (fully transparent) to 1.0 (fully opaque) will be clamped to this range.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgBasicShape.Fill
member.summary: Paints the interior of the given graphical element.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgBasicShape.FillRule
member.summary: It indicates the algorithm which is to be used to determine what parts of the canvas are included inside the shape.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgBasicShape.FillOpacity
member.summary: It specifies the opacity of the painting operation used to paint the interior the current object.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgBasicShape.Stroke
member.summary: Paints along the outline of the given graphical element.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgBasicShape.StrokeOpacity
member.summary: It specifies the opacity of the painting operation used to stroke the current object.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgBasicShape.StrokeWidth
member.summary: The width of the stroke on the current object. If a percentage is used, the value represents a percentage of the current viewport.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgBasicShape.StrokeDashOffSet
member.summary: It specifies the distance into the dash pattern to start the dash.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgBasicShape.StrokeLineCap
member.summary: It specifies the shape to be used at the end of open subpaths when they are stroked.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgBasicShape.StrokeLineJoin
member.summary: It specifies the shape to be used at the corners of paths or basic shapes when they are stroked.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgBasicShape.StrokeMiterLimit
member.summary: When two line segments meet at a sharp angle and miter joins have been specified for 'stroke-linejoin', it is possible for the miter to extend far beyond the thickness of the line stroking the path. The 'stroke-miterlimit' imposes a limit on the ratio of the miter length to the 'stroke-width'. When the limit is exceeded, the join is converted from a miter to a bevel.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgBasicShape.ColorInterpolation
member.summary: It specifies the color space for gradient interpolations, color animations and alpha compositing.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgBasicShape.ColorInterpolationFilters
member.summary: It specifies the color space for imaging operations performed via filter effects.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgBasicShape.ColorRendering
member.summary: It provides a hint to the SVG user agent about how to optimize its color interpolation and compositing operations.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgBasicShape.Display
member.summary: It control the visibility of the graphical element.
member.remarks: When applied to a container element, setting 'display' to none causes the container and all of its children to be invisible; thus, it acts on groups of elements as a group. 'visibility', however, only applies to individual graphics elements. Setting 'visibility' to hidden on a 'g' will make its children invisible as long as the children do not specify their own 'visibility' properties as visible. Note that 'visibility' is not an inheritable property. When the 'display' property is set to none, then the given element does not become part of the rendering tree. With 'visibility' set to hidden, however, processing occurs as if the element were part of the rendering tree and still taking up space, but not actually rendered onto the canvas.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgBasicShape.ImageRendering
member.summary: It provides a hint how to make speed vs. quality tradeoffs as it performs image processing.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgBasicShape.ShapeRendering
member.summary: It provides a hint about what tradeoffs to make as it renders vector graphics elements such as 'path' elements and basic shapes such as circles and rectangles.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgBasicShape.TextRendering
member.summary: It provides a hint to the SVG user agent about how to optimize its color interpolation and compositing operations.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgBasicShape.Visibility
member.summary: It control the visibility of the graphical element.
member.remarks: When applied to a container element, setting 'display' to none causes the container and all of its children to be invisible; thus, it acts on groups of elements as a group. 'visibility', however, only applies to individual graphics elements. Setting 'visibility' to hidden on a 'g' will make its children invisible as long as the children do not specify their own 'visibility' properties as visible. Note that 'visibility' is not an inheritable property. When the 'display' property is set to none, then the given element does not become part of the rendering tree. With 'visibility' set to hidden, however, processing occurs as if the element were part of the rendering tree and still taking up space, but not actually rendered onto the canvas.

member.summary: It represents the circle SVG element.

member.summary: The y-axis coordinate of the center of the circle.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgCircle.R
member.summary: The radius of the circle.

member.name: T:SVGLib.SvgDesc
member.summary: It represents the desc SVG element. Each container element or graphics element in an SVG drawing can supply a 'desc' and/or a 'title' description string where the description is text-only.

member.name: M:SVGLib.SvgDesc.#ctor(SVGLib.SvgDoc)
member.summary: It constructs a desc element with no attribute.

member.name: M:SVGLib.SvgDesc.#ctor(SVGLib.SvgDoc,System.String)
member.summary: It constructs a desc element.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgDesc.Value
member.summary: The value of the element.

member.name: T:SVGLib.SvgDoc
member.summary: It represents the SVG document.

member.name: M:SVGLib.SvgDoc.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor.

member.name: M:SVGLib.SvgDoc.CreateNewDocument
member.summary: It creates a new empty SVG document that contains just the root element. If a current document exists, it is destroyed.
member.returns: The root element of the SVG document.

member.name: M:SVGLib.SvgDoc.LoadFromFile(System.Xml.XmlTextReader)
member.summary: It creates a SVG document reading from a file. If a current document exists, it is destroyed.
member.param: The complete path of a valid SVG file.
member.returns: true if the file is loaded successfully and it is a valid SVG document, false if the file cannot be open or if it is not a valid SVG document.

member.name: M:SVGLib.SvgDoc.SaveToFile(System.String)
member.summary: It saves the current SVG document to a file.
member.param: The complete path of the file.
member.returns: true if the file is saved successfully, false otherwise

member.name: M:SVGLib.SvgDoc.GetXML
member.summary: It returns the XML string of the entire SVG document.
member.returns: The SVG document. An empty string if the document is empty.

member.name: M:SVGLib.SvgDoc.GetSvgElement(System.Int32)
member.summary: It returns the SvgElement with the given internal (numeric) identifier.
member.param: Internal unique identifier of the element.
member.returns: The SvgElement with the given internal Id. Null if no element can be found.

member.name: M:SVGLib.SvgDoc.GetSvgRoot
member.summary: It returns the root element of the SVG document.

member.name: M:SVGLib.SvgDoc.GetSvgElement(System.String)
member.summary: It returns the SvgElement with the given XML Id.
member.returns: The SvgElement with the given XML Id. Null if no element can be found.

member.name: M:SVGLib.SvgDoc.AddElement(SVGLib.SvgElement,SVGLib.SvgElement,SVGLib.SvgElement@)
member.summary: It adds the new element eleToAdd as the last children of the given parent element.
member.param: Parent element. If null the element is added under the root.

member.name: M:SVGLib.SvgDoc.AddElement(SVGLib.SvgElement,System.String,SVGLib.SvgElement@)
member.summary: It creates a new element according to the element name provided and it adds the new element as the last children of the given parent element.
member.param: Parent element. If null the element is added under the root.

member.name: M:SVGLib.SvgDoc.CloneElement(SVGLib.SvgElement,SVGLib.SvgElement,SVGLib.SvgElement)
member.summary: It creates a new element copying all attributes from eleToClone; the new element is inserted under the parent element provided.
member.param: Parent element. If null the element is added under the root.

member.name: M:SVGLib.SvgDoc.AddUnsupported(SVGLib.SvgElement,System.String,SVGLib.SvgElement@)
member.summary: It creates a new SVG Unsupported element.
member.param: Parent element. If null the element is added under the root.
member.remarks: The unsupported element is used when during the parsing of a file an unknown element tag is found.

member.name: M:SVGLib.SvgDoc.AddDesc(SVGLib.SvgElement,SVGLib.SvgElement@)
member.summary: It creates a new SVG Desc element.
member.param: Parent element. If null the element is added under the root.

member.param: Parent element. If null the element is added under the root.

member.name: M:SVGLib.SvgDoc.AddText(SVGLib.SvgElement,SVGLib.SvgElement@)
member.summary: It creates a new SVG Text element.
member.param: Parent element. If null the element is added under the root.

member.name: M:SVGLib.SvgDoc.AddRect(SVGLib.SvgElement,SVGLib.SvgElement@)
member.summary: It creates a new SVG Rect element.
member.param: Parent element. If null the element is added under the root.

member.summary: It deletes an element from the document.

member.returns: true if the element has been successfully deleted; false otherwise.

member.name: M:SVGLib.SvgDoc.ElementPositionUp(SVGLib.SvgElement)
member.summary: It moves the element before its current previous sibling.

member.name: M:SVGLib.SvgDoc.ElementLevelUp(SVGLib.SvgElement)
member.summary: It moves the element one level up in the tree hierarchy.

member.name: M:SVGLib.SvgDoc.ElementPositionDown(SVGLib.SvgElement)
member.summary: It moves the element after its current next sibling.

member.summary: It constructs an image element.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgImage.X
member.summary: The x-axis coordinate of the side of the element which has the smaller x-axis coordinate value in the current user coordinate system. If the attribute is not specified, the effect is as if a value of 0 were specified.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgImage.Y
member.summary: The y-axis coordinate of the side of the element which has the smaller y-axis coordinate value in the current user coordinate system. If the attribute is not specified, the effect is as if a value of 0 were specified.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgImage.Width
member.summary: The width of the element. A value of zero disables rendering of the element.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgImage.Height
member.summary: The height of the element. A value of zero disables rendering of the element.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgImage.Class
member.summary: This attribute assigns a (CSS) class name or set of class names to an element.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgImage.Style
member.summary: This attribute specifies style information for the current element. The style attribute specifies style information for a single element.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgImage.HRef
member.summary: Url of the image file.

member.name: T:SVGLib.SvgPath
member.summary: It represents the path SVG element. Paths represent the outline of a shape which can be filled, stroked, used as a clipping path, or any combination of the three.

member.summary: The definition of the outline of a shape.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgPath.PathLength
member.summary: The author's computation of the total length of the path, in user units.

member.name: T:SVGLib.SvgPolygon
member.summary: It represents the polygon SVG element. The 'polygon' element defines a closed shape consisting of a set of connected straight line segments.

member.summary: It constructs a polygon element with no attribute.

member.summary: It constructs a polygon element.

member.summary: The points that make up the polygon. All coordinate values are in the user coordinate system.

member.summary: It represents the polygon SVG element. The 'polygon' element defines a closed shape consisting of a set of connected straight line segments.

member.summary: It constructs a polygon element with no attribute.

member.summary: It constructs a polygon element.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgPolyline.Points

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgRect.X
member.summary: X-axis coordinate of the side of the element which has the smaller x-axis coordinate value in the current user coordinate system. If the attribute is not specified, the effect is as if a value of 0 were specified.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgRect.Y
member.summary: Y-axis coordinate of the side of the element which has the smaller y-axis coordinate value in the current user coordinate system. If the attribute is not specified, the effect is as if a value of 0 were specified.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgRect.Width
member.summary: Width of the element. A value of zero disables rendering of the element.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgRect.Height
member.summary: Height of the element. A value of zero disables rendering of the element.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgRect.RX
member.summary: For rounded rectangles, the x-axis radius of the ellipse used to round off the corners of the rectangle.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgRect.RY
member.summary: For rounded rectangles, the y-axis radius of the ellipse used to round off the corners of the rectangle.

member.summary: The height of the svg area.

member.name: T:SVGLib.SvgText
member.summary: It represents the text SVG element.

member.name: M:SVGLib.SvgText.#ctor(SVGLib.SvgDoc)
member.summary: It constructs a text element with no attribute.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgText.XmlBase
member.summary: Specifies a base URI other than the base URI of the document or external entity.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgText.XmlLang
member.summary: Standard XML attribute to specify the language (e.g., English) used in the contents and attribute values of particular elements.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgText.XmlSpace
member.summary: Standard XML attribute to specify whether white space is preserved in character data. The only possible values are default and preserve.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgText.Class
member.summary: This attribute assigns a (CSS) class name or set of class names to an element.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgText.Style
member.summary: This attribute specifies style information for the current element. The style attribute specifies style information for a single element.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgText.Value
member.summary: The value of the element.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgText.X
member.summary: The x-axis coordinate of the side of the element which has the smaller x-axis coordinate value in the current user coordinate system. If the attribute is not specified, the effect is as if a value of 0 were specified.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgText.Y
member.summary: The y-axis coordinate of the side of the element which has the smaller y-axis coordinate value in the current user coordinate system. If the attribute is not specified, the effect is as if a value of 0 were specified.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgText.DX
member.summary: Shifts in the current text position along the x-axis for the characters within this element or any of its descendants.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgText.DY
member.summary: Shifts in the current text position along the y-axis for the characters within this element or any of its descendants.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgText.Rotate
member.summary: The supplemental rotation about the current text position that will be applied to all of the glyphs corresponding to each character within this element.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgText.TextLength
member.summary: The author's computation of the total sum of all of the advance values that correspond to character data within this element, including the advance value on the glyph (horizontal or vertical), the effect of properties 'kerning', 'letter-spacing' and 'word-spacing' and adjustments due to attributes dx and dy on 'tspan' elements. This value is used to calibrate the user agent's own calculations with that of the author.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgText.LengthAdjust
member.summary: Indicates the type of adjustments which the user agent shall make to make the rendered length of the text match the value specified on the textLength attribute.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgText.FontFamily
member.summary: Indicates which font family is to be used to render the text, specified as a prioritized list of font family names and/or generic family names.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgText.FontSize
member.summary: This property refers to the size of the font from baseline to baseline when multiple lines of text are set solid in a multiline layout environment.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgText.SizeAdjust
member.summary: This property allows authors to specify an aspect value for an element that will preserve the x-height of the first choice font in a substitute font.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgText.FontWeight
member.summary: This property indicates the desired amount of condensing or expansion in the glyphs used to render the text.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgText.Width
member.summary: The y-axis coordinate of the side of the element which has the smaller y-axis coordinate value in the current user coordinate system. If the attribute is not specified, the effect is as if a value of 0 were specified.

member.name: P:SVGLib.SvgText.Height
member.summary: The y-axis coordinate of the side of the element which has the smaller y-axis coordinate value in the current user coordinate system. If the attribute is not specified, the effect is as if a value of 0 were specified.

member.name: T:SVGLib.SvgUnsupported
member.summary: This class does not represent any SVG element. It is used when parsing an SVG file an unknown element is found.
